name: API Broker
description: Personal API shopper - an intelligent MCP server that recommends the best APIs for your project based on your stack, constraints, and past experiences
author: Alex Stein

onboarding.title: Welcome to API Broker!
steps: Copy `.env.example` to `.env` and add your API keys
Run `npm run db:seed` to initialize the database with provider data
Run `npm run build` to compile TypeScript
Add the MCP server to your Claude Code config (see .mcp.json for example)

requirements.name: Firecrawl API Key
requirements.description: Required for scraping pricing pages and documentation. Get one at firecrawl.dev

requirements.name: GitHub Token
requirements.description: Optional but recommended for higher rate limits when fetching GitHub issues/releases

requirements.name: Exa API Key
requirements.description: Optional - only needed for the API discovery feature
